question: What part of the dishwasher is closed?
options: The top vent of the dishwasher is secured shut.
The front control panel of the dishwasher is firmly shut.
The side door of the dishwasher is tightly closed.
The bottom compartment of the dishwasher is sealed off.
The rack of the dishwasher is closed.

inference.prompt:
